citeinfo.title: Fire extent along monitoring transects for Disney Wilderness Preserve, Florida
Consequences and Correlates of Fire in Wetlands -- JFSP 01-1-3-09 {43FDCF46-8CA2-4FF6-8561-1DF571136A95}

descript.abstract: Distance along transects that burned during prescribed and wild fires.
descript.purpose: To document occurrence of fire along monitoring transects.
descript.supplinf: The Disney Wilderness Preserve (DWP) in Osceola and Polk counties, Florida. Approximate bounding coordinates N: Lat 28.145 Long -81.439; S: Lat 28.029 Long -81.406; E: Lat 28.074 Long -81.373; W: Lat 28.129 Long -81.457

spdom.descgeog: The Disney Wilderness Preserve (DWP) in Osceola and Polk counties, Florida

idinfo.accconst: Requests for data should be directed to the DWP Research Coordinator. Data will be provided in electronic format.
idinfo.useconst: Any reports or publications presenting or referring to these datasets must be approved by the DWP Research Coordinator prior to publication. Proper credit must be given to DWP and The Nature Conservancy.

cntinfo.cntinst: DWP Research Coordinator. As of 5/19/05, this is Sandy Woiak.

idinfo.native: Microsoft Windows XP Version 5.1 (Build 2600) Service Pack 2; ESRI ArcCatalog 9.0.0.535

citeinfo.title: Consequences and Correlates of Fire in Wetlands -- JFSP 01-1-3-09 {43FDCF46-8CA2-4FF6-8561-1DF571136A95}

dataqual.complete: Fire lines are walked to map the burned area extent; large pockets of unburned areas (generally embedded wetlands) are excised.

enttyp.enttypd: Unique ID for each fire, includes date; YYYYMMDD-#
